challenge.title: Introduction to LGBTQ+ Studies - A Cross-Disciplinary Approach
challenge.description: Deborah Amory, Sean Massey, and Jennifer Miller's Introduction to LGBTQ+ Studies: A Cross-Disciplinary Approach is textbook that takes a cross-disciplinary approach to the study of LGBTQ+ issues that helps students grasp core concepts through a variety of different perspectives.
challenge.instructions: Read Introduction to LGBTQ+ Studies: A Cross-Disciplinary Approach.

pageContext.name: Introduction to LGBTQ+ Studies - A Cross-Disciplinary Approach
